name: Virulence
area: all living creatures within a 40-ft.-radius burst centered on you
text: All living creatures within the area of effect, including yourself, must immediately attempt a saving throw with a –2 penalty against any and all diseases they have contracted, even if the onset time has not yet elapsed. On a failed saving throw, the affliction has its usual effect. A successful save does not count toward curing the affliction.
target_zh: 以你为中心半径40尺爆发范围内的所有活物
area_zh: 以你为中心40尺半径爆发范围内的活物
text_zh: 范围内的所有受影响的生物，包括你自己，必须立即对他们感染的任何和所有疾病进行豁免投骰，即使发病时间尚未到达，在这次尝试中要承受-2的减值。豁免失败时，苦难会产生通常的效果。成功的豁免也不会计入治愈苦难的次数。
